content.html: The term ‘woke’ has been hijacked. It simply means - ‘I’m awake. I’m not naive to what’s truly going on’ - the word has been robbed of its true meaning and used to divide people and create opposing ideologies.... to understand why, well, then you’d have to be ‘woke’ #staywoke
